title: patch 7.13 but no skt skins?
body: Riot said in patch 7.13 the skt skins will be release but where are the skins?

replies.body: The patch notes preview skins that are aimed to release, but it doesn't necessarily mean it will be on the same day of the patch.  Bookmark the [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page to stay up to date on the goodies.  Hang tight!
Is there currently any ETA to go by? Really looking forward to the new Nami skin. ^_^

https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/6kfu31/psa_skt_t1_skins_to_be_released_today/djly3wy/

Great Nami recall indeed, but not the first time I've seen it.

http://danbooru.donmai.us/data/dd6109ebc850da0d95d32a3859f1206d.jpg

...They really do love killing off memes these days.

> [{quoted}](name=SSJ Nami,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=JhT3Ka3F,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-06-29T19:54:06.497+0000)
>
> Is there currently any ETA to go by? Really looking forward to the new Nami skin. ^_^

Yeah I want that Ekko skin bad bro.  I bought rp yesterday expecting them to be out

I saw a post the other day saying that they will be out on 7-5. Sad that they posted it on reddit and not on their official website. I think everyone was expecting them to be out a day or 2 after the patch. :/

Almost a week into the patch and still no skin update! You're killing us, Riot. At least tell us the pricing plan, if there will be a complete package discount, and when we can get our hands on these works of art.
